Module scenebuilder.templates
Package com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.template.controller

Class TemplateController

java.lang.Object
com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.template.controller.TemplateController
@Component
public class TemplateController
extends Object
Allow control of Template selection and loading into a document window

ptreilhes
